name: NovaBACKUP Restore Script
summary: Learn about .NRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IT professionals, system administrators, and individual users who rely on NovaBACKUP to protect data on personal or business systems are the most likely users to encounter NRS files. NovaBACKUP uses NRS files to automate the restore process, so users do not need to select each file manually.

description: An NRS file is a restore script created by NovaStor NovaBACKUP, a Windows backup and recovery program. It contains a list of instructions that specify which files to restore and where to place them. Users typically generate NRS files when creating a backup job and then later open them when restoring the saved data.

instructions: You can open NRS files with NovaStor NovaBACKUP in Windows. When you open an NRS file with NovaBACKUP, the software reads the NRS file to retrieve the specified files from the backup set and place them in their original or user-defined locations, ensuring that restored data matches the original file structure.
